modName: Stacked Against Gravity Body and Armors with BBP and Scaling
summary:
Killer Keo Armors converted for a D-cup to K-cup breast range. Everything currently converted.
Nocturnal Dress and MaikCG Deadric Armor converted as well.
I have also completed my very own body, Teals03 Stacked Against Gravity Body. D-cup to K-cup breast range.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#98FB98][u][b]---------- News ----------[/b][/u][/color]

09/26/12 - Added textures to the Feybust Armor.

09/20/12 - Added the Feybust Armor (Unfinished). This is the white armor that I had started to work on a long time ago. It\'s not finished and there is no scale (only large). Currently replacing dragonscale armor, but you can rename it to replace anything.

03/14/12 - Farm clothes 01, fine clothes 01, and wolf armor added.

03/08/12 - TSAG body v2.0 added. MaikCG daedric armor and nocturnal dress converted to the TSAG body. Scale skeleton pack added.
03/01/12 - Fur/Bandit with 4 variants, Imperial Heavy SS, Dark Brotherhood Full added
02/23/12 - Ebonymail added. Archmage fixed.
02/22/12 - All armors fixed and improved. Iron, Archmage, and three Thieves Guild variants added.


[color=#FF1493][u][b]---------- Teals03 Stacked Against Gravity Body v2.0 with BBP ----------[/b][/u][/color]

Teals03 Stacked Against Gravity Body v2.0 is out. The body has been significantly smoothed, the shape of the body has been tweaked, seams should be mostly gone. The approximate cup size ranges from a D-cup to a K-cup.

Requires a BBP compatible skeleton. The only place to get *ALL* of the required files are from CherryHotaling\'s CHSBHC mod(link below). TSAG body textures are compatible with any CBBEv3 textures. Non hi-res textures can be found from Caliente\'s CBBE mod(link below).


[color=#FFA500][u][b]---------- Scaling ----------[/b][/u][/color]

Five different scale skeletons have been used to create various changes to the shapes and sizes of BBP compatible bodies. Each scale skeleton has six variations that focus on changing the breast sizes, creating thirty possible variations in total. The different sizes included are ranged from 50% - 75% - Unchanged - 125% - 150% - 200%.

CHSBHC Skeleton - Intended porportions, used as a base to compare the other skeletons.
Ning Perfect Skeleton - Smaller waist, slightly smaller butt, slightly different breast shape.
VadersApp Skeleton - Smaller breasts, breast bouncing is scaled depending on breast size.
vsTerminus Skeleton - Perky breasts, breasts sit further apart.
Anonymous Skeleton - Character is taller, thighs are larger, butt is slightly bigger. Author has requested to remain unknown, hence the name.


[color=#FF4500][u][b]---------- Armors/Clothes converted ----------[/b][/u][/color]

*# = Number of Variants
[color=#32CD32]Green[/color] = Newly Added

Archmage Robes
Barkeeper
Blacksmith
Blades Armor
Daedric Armor (Flame Atronach)
Daedric Armor (MaikCG)
Dark Brotherhood Armor Corset
Dark Brotherhood Armor Full
Dragonbone Armor
Dragonscale Armor
Draugr Armor (Ancient Nord)
Dwarven Armor
Ebony Armor
Ebonymail
Elven Armor
Farm Clothes 02
Farm Clothes 03
Farm Clothes 04
Forsworn Armor
Fur/Bandit Armor*4
Glass Armor
Hide Armor*4
Imperial Armor*3
Imperial Heavy Super Skimpy
Iron Armor*2
Mage Apprentice
Nightingale
Nocturnal Dress
Nord Plate Armor
Orcish Armor
Savior\'s Hide
Steel Armor
Stormcloaks Armor*2
Studded Armor
Thalmor Robes
Thieves Guild*4
TSAG MaikCG Daedric Armor
TSAG Nocturnal Dress
Wench Clothes
[color=#32CD32]Farm Clothes 01
Fine Clothes 01
Wolf Armor[/color]


[color=#87CEFA][u][b]---------- Description ----------[/b][/u][/color]

I have converted Killer Keo\'s skimpy armors and a few others. The body slider range is from CBBE Curvy to CBBE Super Silly Huge. All conversions have BBP. You NEED the Skeleton files from Cherry Hotalings CHSBHC mod. If you don\'t want the breasts to bounce, then simply dont install the animation files that come with CHSBHC. I made extra changes to some of the armors that have multiple variants to make them more unique. I will convert new armors as they are released.


[color=#87CEFA][u][b]---------- Installation ----------[/b][/u][/color]

Just copy the Meshes or Textures(if included) folders into your ...Skyrim/Data/ installation folder.


[color=#87CEFA][u][b]---------- Important ----------[/b][/u][/color]

[u]Required[/u]:
Cherry Hotalings CHSBHC with BBP - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4888] Here [/url]
[i]Breasts wont bounce and you will get CTDs without it.[/i]

[u]Recommended[/u]:
Calientes CBBE Body - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666] Here [/url]
[i]There could be seams at the wrists/ankles/neck if not used.[/i]


[color=#87CEFA][u][b]---------- Alternatives ----------[/b][/u][/color]

Original Armors by Killer Keo - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3654] Here [/url]

CHSBHC Killer Keos Skimpy Armor with BBP by Nimbonius - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7475] Here [/url]

Daedric Female Armor Replacer by MaikCG - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5162] Here [/url]

CBBE Daedric Female by Laxi2610 - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6316] Here [/url]

BBP Scale for CHSBHC with BBP by VadersApp - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7814] Here [/url]

The Skeleton of Female Models by Ning - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11064] Here [/url]


[color=#87CEFA][u][b]---------- Credits and Thanks ----------[/b][/u][/color]

Killer Keo for his sexy skimpy armor conversions.
Caliente for her insightful body slider, wonderful CBBE SSH body, and Nocturnal Dress.
CherryHotaling for her bouncy BBP and awesome armor modding guide.
MaikCG for his sexy version of the Daedric Armor.
Laxi2610 for converting MaikCG\'s Daedric Armor to be CBBE compatible and making my life much easier.
VadersApp for his smaller breast skeleton that also scales breast bouncing depending on size.
vsTerminus for showing me how to edit the skeleton files to scale the breast size and for his edited skeleton.
Ning for his perfect skeleton with a smaller waist.
Anonymous for providing a skeleton that increases height, and the size of the thighs and butt.

For without any of the above I would not have been able to create these conversions and we would not be able to have such a catered and improved Skyrim experience.

Problems? Questions? Comments? Let me know.
author: Teals03
